entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Waterton Park Gate 04:00 AM MDT Thursday 28 April 2016
Temperature: 0.6°C
Humidity: 95 %
Dewpoint: -0.1°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and rain showers changing to a few rain showers this morning. Snow level rising to 1500 metres this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening then partly cloudy. Snow level 1600 metres. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 28 April 2016

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Snow level 1600 metres rising to 2000 metres in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High 11. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Thursday 28 April 2016
